name: POC_HSPC_DX
description: Contains information concerning the hospice diagnoses corresponding to the plan of care.

columns.name: POC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: POC_HSPC_DX_ID
columns.description: The hospice diagnoses at the time of the completed plan of care.
